EmailTemplate.description: cloned from the 013 december 2018 us get webinar invite
EmailTemplate.name: Global_Email_GET Partner Newsletter_2018.014 December 2018 EMEA GET Webinar Invi
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal Global Ecosystem November EMEA Webinar: PCF 2.3 and 2.4
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
We are excited to welcome Jared Ruckle, Pivotal Marketing Manager, for the December Global Ecosystem webinar. Jared will deliver a partner-centric look at PCF 2.3 and PCF 2.4, including:
- New features of Pivotal Cloud Foundry - A brief demo of new features
- Feedback session to answer any questions
We are holding a special session for the European market at 4pm CET. Please select the 'December 18 - EMEA Webinar' from the event list on the registration page.Date: Tuesday, December 18, 2018
Time: 4PM CET
Thanks, The Pivotal Global Ecosystem Team Register here <[[https://partners.pivotal.io/English/webinars-events.aspx]]>
